meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kristina Johnson Patrick Wyman Alex Schmidt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7839.

td.p: Kristina Johnson, a freelance writer and stay-at-home mom from Flushing, New York
Patrick Wyman, a history podcaster and writer from Los Angeles, California
Alex Schmidt, a writer and comedian from Pasadena, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $64,879)

tr.td: CARTOON FEMALES
STOCK SYMBOLS
A RIVER RUNS THROUGH IT: WORLD CAPITAL EDITION
I NEED A HOBBY!
METEOROLOGICAL RHYME TIME
EDISON LABS
(Jimmy: The national historical park in New Jersey that produced 40 years of inventive genius.)
